bug.short_desc: dnf install qt5- installs something instead of fali
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
[brain@x1carbon x86_64-redhat-linux-gnu]$ sudo dnf install qt5- --assumeno Last metadata expiration check: 2:42:37 ago on Sat Jul 23 15:24:12 2016. Dependencies resolved. ===================================================================================== Package Arch Version Repository Size ===================================================================================== Installing: assimp x86_64 3.2.0-4.fc25 rawhide 1.8 M irrXML x86_64 1.8.3-1.fc24.1 rawhide 46 k libaesgm x86_64 20090429-12.fc24 rawhide 48 k poly2tri x86_64 0.0-11.20130501hg26242d0aa7b8.fc24 rawhide 29 k qt5 noarch 5.7.0-6.fc25 rawhide 7.3 k qt5-gstreamer x86_64 1.2.0-11.fc25 rawhide 229 k qt5-qdbusviewer x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 54 k qt5-qt3d x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 1.1 M qt5-qtaccountsservice x86_64 0.6.0-2.fc24 rawhide 57 k qt5-qtbase-mysql x86_64 5.7.0-3.fc25 rawhide 57 k qt5-qtbase-postgresql x86_64 5.7.0-3.fc25 rawhide 58 k qt5-qtconfiguration x86_64 0.3.1-2.fc24 rawhide 66 k qt5-qtconnectivity x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 451 k qt5-qtdoc noarch 5.7.0-1.fc25 rawhide 5.2 M qt5-qtgraphicaleffects x86_64 5.7.0-1.fc25 rawhide 546 k qt5-qtimageformats x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 114 k qt5-qtlocation x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 721 k qt5-qtquickcontrols x86_64 5.7.0-1.fc25 rawhide 899 k qt5-qtquickcontrols2 x86_64 5.7.0-1.fc25 rawhide 488 k qt5-qtscript x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 1.0 M qt5-qtsensors x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 209 k qt5-qtserialport x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 66 k qt5-qtsvg x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 155 k qt5-qttools x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 44 k qt5-qttools-common noarch 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 25 k qt5-qttools-libs-designer x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 2.7 M qt5-qtwayland x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 679 k qt5-qtwebchannel x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 85 k qt5-qtwebengine x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 31 M qt5-qtwebkit x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 10 M qt5-qtwebsockets x86_64 5.7.0-1.fc25 rawhide 82 k qt5-qtx11extras x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 29 k re2 x86_64 20160401-2.fc25 rawhide 173 k
Transaction Summary ===================================================================================== Install 33 Packages
Total download size: 59 M Installed size: 190 M Operation aborted.
"qt5-" is not package and doesn't exist, but DNF still installs something..
Not sure if fixed in 2.0.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.

Seems it has been fixed during dnf 2.0 development.
# rpm -q dnf dnf-2.0.0-0.rc1.4.fc26.noarch
# dnf install qt5- --assumeno Last metadata expiration check: 3:41:08 ago on Fri Nov 11 11:07:02 2016 CET. No package qt5- available. Error: Unable to find a match
# dnf install qt5 --assumeno Last metadata expiration check: 3:43:08 ago on Fri Nov 11 11:07:02 2016 CET. Dependencies resolved. ========================================================================================================== Package Arch Version Repository Size ========================================================================================================== Installing: qt5 noarch 5.7.0-10.fc26 rawhide 7.8 k Installing dependencies: ... qt-settings noarch 25-2.fc26 rawhide 25 k qt5-gstreamer x86_64 1.2.0-11.fc25 rawhide 229 k qt5-qdbusviewer x86_64 5.7.0-3.fc26 rawhide 54 k qt5-qt3d x86_64 5.7.0-2.fc25 rawhide 1.1 M qt5-qtaccountsservice x86_64 0.6.0-2.fc24 rawhide 56 k qt5-qtbase x86_64 5.7.0-9.fc26 rawhide 3.0 M qt5-qtbase-common noarch 5.7.0-9.fc26 rawhide 30 k ...
